flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: 1. For this science fair project, the independent variable is the DC voltage. You will need a variable power supply (as shown here), a electrolysis apparatus, and concentrated sulfuric acid.
lines.text_raw: 1. For this science fair project, the independent variable is the DC voltage. You will need a variable power supply (as shown here), a electrolysis apparatus, and concentrated sulfuric acid.

lines.text: . Using the pliers, strip both copper wires of approximately 30 millimeters of insulation on both ends. and place them inside the beaker,
lines.text_raw: . Using the pliers, strip both copper wires of approximately 30 millimeters of insulation on both ends. and place them inside the beaker,

guide.summary: This science fair project was done to investigate the effect of increasing DC voltage and the concentration of electrolyte salt on the rate of production of hydrogen gas during the process of electrolysis
guide.title: Electrolysis
